VIII.iv.3.C.3.e
.
Formally Denying IU
Formally code the rating decision to indicate denial of IU if
the Veteran specifically claims entitlement to IU, and
any of the requirements of
38 CFR 4.16
are not met.
Note
:  If the Veteran disagrees with the decision under the legacy appeal process, the statement of the case (SOC) should cite the relevant portion of
38 CFR 4.16
as the authority for the denial.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C - Individual Unemployability (IU) Rating and Decision Review
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C
